Package com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.common

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JarHelper.UnjarListener
    Listener for jar extraction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AaptCommandBuilder
    Collates commands used to invoke Aapt.
    AaptCommandBuilder.AaptDumpCommandBuilder
    Class that responsible for building aapt commands for dumping information from apk file
    AaptCommandBuilder.AaptPackageCommandBuilder
    Class that responsible for building appt commands for packaging resources
    AndroidExtension
    The file system extension for the Android artifact also used for the packaging type of an Android Maven Project.
    ArtifactResolverHelper
    Provides convenient functions for resolving artifacts.
    Const
    Constants used by this plugin.
    Const.ArtifactType  
    DependencyResolver
    Resolves the aar and apklib dependencies for an Artifact.
    DeviceHelper
    A bunch of helper methods for dealing with IDevice instances.
    FileNameHelper
    FileNameHelper can make a valid filename.
    FileRetriever
    Retrieves the names of layout resource files.
    JarHelper
    Helper class to deal with jar files.
    LogSyncProgressMonitor
    LogSyncProgressMonitor is an implementation of the ISyncProgressMonitor from the Android ddmlib that logs to the Maven Plugin log passed into it.
    MavenToPlexusLogAdapter
    Maps from a Maven Logger to a Plexus Log.
    NativeHelper  
    UnpackedLibHelper
    Provides convenience methods for unpacking Android libraries so that their contents can be used in the build.
    XmlHelper
    Yet another helper class for dealing with XML.
    ZipExtractor
    Extract an archive to a given location.
